name: The Star Bowling DX
overview: The Star Bowling DX is abowling game that features a story mode in which the player meet some japanese girls in a bowling alley and after that he will compete againts them. The first 2 cds features 5 different girls in each cd, the third cd features new alleys to play. The game features cartoon graphics for the alleys and prerendered graphics for the characters, the gameplay is in first person perspective and the player have to press the Circle button three times to throw the ball.
